name: Puzplus
description:
Train and keep your brain working with Puzplus now!
A brand new, easy to play math puzzle game!

You don't need to be math genius, just tap the numbers for finding the total number in different challenge.

How to play:
Complete all sections in each level by using all numbers below to sum up to your target. Unlock new levels and Worlds by overcoming the challenges Puzplus throws at you.

Collect start and reach a high score:
Puzplus uses its advanced, unique method based on time and the number of moves for each level to define your score.

Use your accumulated stars to advance faster in the game. Can't decide what number to pick next? Tap the Hint button above and Puzplus will take you a step closer to get to the solution. Don't like a section? No problem! Tap Skip Section to move on to the next one. Want to unlock new Worlds? Perfectly fine! Tap Unlock and move on as you like!

Worlds:
Each Puzplus World is uniquely designed to add new challenges to your gaming experience.

Puzplus features:
● Genius ways to play: Simple Target Score, Time Challenge and Move Count Challenge
● Spin the Lucky Wheel to win surprise gifts!
● Unlock new Worlds and
● Leaderboard to watch your friends and competitors!
